texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.ProjectMustConatin5Characters: Project code must consist of 5 characters/numbers.
texts.ProjectNameMustBetween2And100: Name must be between 2 and 100 characters.
texts.ItemGreaterThanzero: Item must be greater than zero.
